articles.title: Indiana QB Fernando Mendoza wins 2025 Heisman Trophy - NFL.com
articles.description: Fernando Mendoza, the mercurial quarterback of No. 1 Indiana, won the Heisman Trophy on Saturday night, becoming the first Hoosier to win college football’s most prestigious award since its inception in 1935.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Messi’s tour of India gets off to chaotic start as angry fans storm field - The Seattle Times
articles.description: Many ticket-holders reportedly said they failed to see Messi at all — either in person or on the stadium’s big screens — despite waiting for hours.
articles.content: KOLKATA, India (AP) Lionel Messis much-hyped tour of India got off to a rocky start Saturday with angry fans throwing bottles and attempting to vandalize a stadium after many of them failed to get mo… [+1335 chars]

articles.author: Thomas Beaumont, Isabella Volmert, The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump couldn't insult his way to victory in Indiana redistricting battle. 'Folks in our state don’t react well to being bullied' - Fortune
articles.description: The president brushed off the defeat, saying he “wasn’t working on it very hard." But the White House had spent months engaged in what Republican Sen. Andy Zay described as “a full-court press.”
articles.content: If Indiana Republican senators had any doubt about what to do with President Donald Trumps redistricting proposal, he helped them make up their minds the night before this weeks vote.In a social medi… [+5208 chars]
